Class PinArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.plus.PinArray

  • public class PinArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a list of Arduino pins.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    marcocipriani01
    See Also:
    PinValue, ArduinoPin

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(ArduinoPin pin)
        Adds a pin to the list.
        Parameters:
        pin - the pin to be added.

      • checkPins

        public static boolean checkPins​(ArduinoPin[]... pins)
        Looks for duplicated pins in a list.
        Parameters:
        pins - lists of pins
        Returns:
        true if no duplicates are found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if a pin is outside the allowed bounds (2 ≤ pin ≤ 99)

      • clear

        public void clear​()
        Clears the list.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(int pin)
        Parameters:
        pin - a pin to look for.
        Returns:
        true if this list contains the given pin.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(ArduinoPin pin)
        Parameters:
        pin - a pin to look for.
        Returns:
        true if this list contains the given pin.

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf​(ArduinoPin pin)
        Parameters:
        pin - a pin to look for.
        Returns:
        the index of the first occurrence of the specified element in this list, or -1 if this list does not contain the element.

      • remove

        public void remove​(ArduinoPin pin)
        Removes the given pin from the list.
        Parameters:
        pin - a pin to remove.

      • size

        public int size​()
        Returns:
        the size of the list.

      • toArray

        public ArduinoPin[] toArray​()
        Returns:
        an array containing all the pins of this list.
